name: @atomic-ehr/codegen
description: Code generation tools for FHIR resources and TypeSchema definitions

scripts.build: bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist --target node --format esm --splitting --external typescript
scripts.docs:build: bun run docs:api && bun run docs:validate
scripts.docs:validate: bun run docs:validate:links && bun run docs:validate:examples
scripts.docs:validate:links: echo 'Validating documentation links...' && find docs -name '*.md' -exec grep -l 'http' {} \;
scripts.docs:validate:examples: echo 'Validating code examples...' && bun run examples:test
scripts.examples: echo 'Running all examples...' && bun run examples:basic && bun run examples:frontend && bun run examples:api
scripts.examples:basic: cd examples/basic-usage && bun install && bun run generate:all
scripts.examples:frontend: cd examples/frontend-app && bun install && bun run build
scripts.examples:api: cd examples/healthcare-api && bun install && bun run build
scripts.examples:test: bun run examples:basic && echo 'Examples validated successfully'

author: Atomic EHR Team
